content: The following steps might be helpful: "Settings" → "Accounts" section → Long-press the account which you want to move, or tap the two-horizontal-bar icon on the right hand side of the account which you want to move. → Drag and drop the account to your preferred location.
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content:
Version 10 is quite old, but that's because subsequent versions have had difficulties.

Version 13 should be available later this week. Please post your status after you are able to update.
creator: wsmwk

content: Do you mean that you cannot remember the password of your email account? If so, the following link might be helpful: Password https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1510902#answer-1731896
